events.name: Review of LIB recovery technologies and their impacts
events.wd_label: Review of LIB recovery technologies and their impacts
events.wd_description: This paper reviews recent articles on different LIB recovery technologies, their commercial applications, and the advantages and disadvantages of each method. It also examines the economic and environmental impacts and reverse supply chain optimization strategies for maximizing benefits.
events.description: This paper reviews recent articles on different LIB recovery technologies, their commercial applications, and the advantages and disadvantages of each method. It also examines the economic and environmental impacts and reverse supply chain optimization strategies for maximizing benefits.

events.name: LIB recovery technologies
events.wd_description: The review covers different LIB recovery technologies, their commercial applications, and the advantages and disadvantages of each method.
events.description: The review covers different LIB recovery technologies, their commercial applications, and the advantages and disadvantages of each method.

events.name: Commercial applications
events.wd_description: The review discusses the commercial applications of various LIB recovery technologies.
events.description: The review discusses the commercial applications of various LIB recovery technologies.

events.name: Economic impacts
events.wd_description: The review examines the economic impacts of different LIB recovery technologies.
events.description: The review examines the economic impacts of different LIB recovery technologies.

events.name: Environmental impacts
events.wd_description: The review evaluates the environmental impacts of different LIB recovery technologies.
events.description: The review evaluates the environmental impacts of different LIB recovery technologies.

events.name: Reverse supply chain optimization
events.wd_description: The review explores reverse supply chain optimization strategies to maximize economic and environmental benefits.
events.description: The review explores reverse supply chain optimization strategies to maximize economic and environmental benefits.

events.name: Limitations and future work in LCA studies of LIB recovery
events.wd_label: Limitations and future work in LCA studies of LIB recovery
events.wd_description: The existing LCA literature rarely includes value recovery supply chain and transportation-related impacts. Future studies should standardize the functional unit and LCA methods, and disclose full life cycle inventory data to facilitate data interpretation.
events.description: The existing LCA literature rarely includes value recovery supply chain and transportation-related impacts. Future studies should standardize the functional unit and LCA methods, and disclose full life cycle inventory data to facilitate data interpretation.

events.name: LCA limitations
events.wd_description: The existing LCA studies often assume transportation distances without elaboration and lack standardization in functional units and methods, leading to heterogeneous results.
events.description: The existing LCA studies often assume transportation distances without elaboration and lack standardization in functional units and methods, leading to heterogeneous results.

events.name: Future research directions
events.wd_description: Future studies should explore the supply chain implications of recycled LIB materials, standardize functional units and LCA methods, and disclose full life cycle inventory data.
events.description: Future studies should explore the supply chain implications of recycled LIB materials, standardize functional units and LCA methods, and disclose full life cycle inventory data.

events.name: Future research directions for LIB recovery technologies
events.wd_label: Future research directions for LIB recovery technologies
events.wd_description: Future research should address the limitations of direct recycling technologies for industry adoption, develop cost-effective sortation technologies, and explore policy incentives to promote LIB recovery.
events.description: Future research should address the limitations of direct recycling technologies for industry adoption, develop cost-effective sortation technologies, and explore policy incentives to promote LIB recovery.

events.name: Direct recycling
events.wd_description: Future research should address the limitations associated with direct recycling to make it more viable for industry adoption.
events.description: Future research should address the limitations associated with direct recycling to make it more viable for industry adoption.

events.name: Sortation technologies
events.wd_description: Developing cost-effective sortation technologies is crucial for separating batteries with different cathodes.
events.description: Developing cost-effective sortation technologies is crucial for separating batteries with different cathodes.

events.name: Policy incentives
events.wd_description: Policy incentives that promote LIB recovery could enhance the economic viability of LIB recycling.
events.description: Policy incentives that promote LIB recovery could enhance the economic viability of LIB recycling.

events.name: Optimal reverse logistics network for spent LIBs
events.wd_label: Optimal reverse logistics network for spent LIBs
events.wd_description: Designing an optimal reverse logistics network for spent LIBs can minimize operations cost and GHG emissions. Different strategies such as reuse, remanufacturing, and recycling are considered for handling spent batteries.
events.description: Designing an optimal reverse logistics network for spent LIBs can minimize operations cost and GHG emissions. Different strategies such as reuse, remanufacturing, and recycling are considered for handling spent batteries.

events.name: Reverse logistics network
events.wd_description: Designing an optimal reverse logistics network can help minimize costs and GHG emissions.
events.description: Designing an optimal reverse logistics network can help minimize costs and GHG emissions.

events.name: Reuse
events.wd_description: Reuse is one of the strategies considered for handling spent LIBs in the reverse logistics network.
events.description: Reuse is one of the strategies considered for handling spent LIBs in the reverse logistics network.

events.name: Remanufacturing
events.wd_description: Remanufacturing is another strategy considered for handling spent LIBs in the reverse logistics network.
events.description: Remanufacturing is another strategy considered for handling spent LIBs in the reverse logistics network.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: Recycling is a key strategy for handling spent LIBs in the reverse logistics network.
events.description: Recycling is a key strategy for handling spent LIBs in the reverse logistics network.

events.name: Integration of remanufacturing and recycling in the supply chain
events.wd_label: Integration of remanufacturing and recycling in the supply chain
events.wd_description: Integrating remanufacturing and recycling into the existing forward supply chain of LIBs can increase total profit and reduce costs. This strategy mainly influences transportation cost, raw material purchasing cost, and processing cost.
events.description: Integrating remanufacturing and recycling into the existing forward supply chain of LIBs can increase total profit and reduce costs. This strategy mainly influences transportation cost, raw material purchasing cost, and processing cost.

events.name: Remanufacturing integration
events.wd_description: Integrating remanufacturing into the existing forward supply chain can increase total profit.
events.description: Integrating remanufacturing into the existing forward supply chain can increase total profit.

events.name: Recycling integration
events.wd_description: Integrating recycling into the existing forward supply chain can also increase total profit.
events.description: Integrating recycling into the existing forward supply chain can also increase total profit.

events.name: Cost reduction
events.wd_description: The integration strategy reduces transportation cost, raw material purchasing cost, and processing cost.
events.description: The integration strategy reduces transportation cost, raw material purchasing cost, and processing cost.

events.name: Optimization models for LIB recycling networks
events.wd_label: Optimization models for LIB recycling networks
events.wd_description: Various optimization models for LIB recycling networks consider factors such as sequential deployment of recycling plants, initial capacity of inspection sites, and optimal facility locations to minimize cost and GHG emissions.
events.description: Various optimization models for LIB recycling networks consider factors such as sequential deployment of recycling plants, initial capacity of inspection sites, and optimal facility locations to minimize cost and GHG emissions.

events.name: Sequential deployment
events.wd_description: Sequential deployment of recycling plants over time can return a higher net present value.
events.description: Sequential deployment of recycling plants over time can return a higher net present value.

events.name: Initial capacity
events.wd_description: Increasing the initial capacity of inspection sites and recycling centers is important to accommodate the increasing volume of spent LIBs.
events.description: Increasing the initial capacity of inspection sites and recycling centers is important to accommodate the increasing volume of spent LIBs.

events.name: Optimal facility locations
events.wd_description: Optimal facility locations are determined using geospatial modeling to minimize cost and GHG emissions.
events.description: Optimal facility locations are determined using geospatial modeling to minimize cost and GHG emissions.

events.name: Transportation impacts
events.description: Significant factor affecting the environmental impact of LIB recycling, involving mode and distance of transport.

events.name: Standardization of functional units and methods
events.description: Needed to ensure consistency and comparability in LCA studies.

events.name: Life cycle inventory data disclosure
events.description: Required for transparency, reliability, and repeatability of LCA studies.

events.name: Increased total profit
events.description: Result of integrating remanufacturing and recycling into the supply chain.

events.name: Geospatial modeling
events.description: Used to determine the optimal locations for recycling facilities to minimize cost and GHG emissions.

events.name: Minimizing GHG emissions
events.description: Goal of optimizing facility locations to reduce transportation-related emissions.
